document.full_text: alibaba founder jack ma didn't shed new light on his negotiations with yahoo inc and softbank during an appearance at a conference on wednesday, but he did offer some unexpected advice for yahoo.
document.title: alibaba's ma offers yahoo some advice: break up
lines_and_colors: alibaba founder jack ma didn't shed new light on his negotiations with yahoo inc and softbank during an appearance at a conference on wednesday, but he did offer some unexpected advice for yahoo.
